Dr. Y. Anthony Nakamura places patient safety,
comfort, and complete satisfaction at the foremost
of his method to guarantee the very best possible
experience and aesthetic outcome. With over 25 years
of experience as a board-certified plastic surgeon
and an esteemed cosmetic improvement professional,
Dr. Nakamura supplies a warm, personalized method
for every patient from consultation to aftercare. He
understands that every person's cosmetic and health
objectives are as distinct as their personality, and
that's why so many patients from Arlington, Dallas
Fort Worth, and surrounding communities in Texas
seek out Accent on You.
